name: LCG
tagline: A software for hybrid closed-loop electrophysiological experiments
body:
### Welcome to the homepage of the LCG project ### Features ### Installation ### Authors and Contributors LCG is mostly written by Daniele Linaro (@danielelinaro), with major contributions by João Couto (@jcouto). ### Contacts Daniele Linaro - danielelinaro@gmail.com
João Couto - jpcouto@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
